posts.caption: CHICKEN PARMESAN 4 OR 6 (smart chicken)CHICKEN BREASTS2 EGGSFRESH CHOPPED PARSLEYA FEW MINCED GARLIC CLOVESSALT AND PEPPER 2 JARS OF YOUR FAVORITE MARINARA SAUCE. ( I LIKE RAO’S)GLUTEN FREE ITALIAN SEASONED BREAD CRUMBS. (I LIKE IAN’S)GRATED PARMESAN CHEESE1/2 CUP OLIVE OIL 4 FRESH MOZZARELLA BALLS IN WATER HANDFUL OF CHOPPED BASIL PREHEAT OVEN TO 430 FWHISK THE EGGS, MINCED GARLIC, SALT, PEPPER AND PARSLEY. MIX IN CHICKEN BREASTS AND COVER MARINATE FOR AT LEAST 15 MINUTES IN THE FRIDGE BUT THE LONGER THE BETTER. EVEN OVERNIGHT IF YOU HAVE THE TIME. WHEN READY TO COOK PUT BREAD CRUMBS AND HANDFUL OF PARMESAN CHEESE IN A SHALLOW PLATTER. DIP CHICKEN AND LIGHTLY COVER. HEAT OLIVE OIL IN LARGE FRYING PAN OVER MEDIUM HIGH HEAT UNTIL HOT AND SHIMMERING. COOK CHICKEN ONE SIDE AT A TIME, UNTIL GOLDEN BROWN, AROUND 4 MINUTES PER SIDE. REMEMBER YOU WILL PUT IN THE OVEN LATER TO MELT MOZZERELLA. PLACE CHICKEN IN A BAKING DISH AND COVER WITH WARMED MARINARA SAUCE. TOP WITH SLICED MOZZARELLA. SPRINKLE PARMESAN AND CHOPPED BASIL. BAKE FOR 15 -20 MINUTES.#courteneycoox 🎥 @jadeehlers
Happy Easter! The only ones who didn’t mind taking these pictures with me, are in the last slide. 🐣🐰💐💕
